sentence.Network_en: I'm trying to buy some cheroot.
For a little cigar, a cheroot, if you please, he will escort you all over Paris.
sentence.Network_cn: 你若站下看一件衬衣或是一颗衬衫领扣, 他便马上来精神了. ”

sentence.Network_en: For a Manila cheroot and the price of a drink he will suck any Hindu's ass.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了一支马尼拉雪前和买一杯酒的钱他愿意舔随便哪个印度人的屁股.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(C2)d ... Cherokee 切罗基族人 cheroot 方头雪茄 cherry bay 月桂.
［食品词典］C7_专业词汇_专业英语_食品伙伴网 ... chemotropism 向药性 cheroot 方头雪茄烟 cherry apple 海棠（果）.
《韦伯斯特新世界词典》中将平头平尾雪茄（cheroot）（Cheroot）描述为一种两端都被切成方形的雪茄，属其他类型烟草制品。提到这种雪茄， …
然后, 到土产雪茄厂(Cheroot), 那些包烟的女工仲醒到不得了, 英文好掂. 虽然以上的景点, 全部是为游客而设的工场, 但是提供了免费.

list.abs: or he will offer to walk you there and save a franc or two , knowing very well that it will be necessary to pass a tabac on the way and that you will please be so good as to buy me a little cheroot .他或许会主动提出步行送你去，节省一两个法郎，因为他很清楚途中一定会路过一家烟铺，你只好给他买一支雪茄。

or he will offer to walk you there and save a franc or two , knowing very well that it will be necessary to pass a tabac on the way and that you will please be so good as to buy me a little cheroot .他或许会主动提出步行送你去，节省一两个法郎，因为他很清楚途中一定会路过一家烟铺，你只好给他买一支雪茄。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French cheroute, from Tamil curuṭṭ̣u 'roll of tobacco'

entry.def: A cheroot is a cigar with both ends cut flat.

means.word_mean: 1. a cigar with both ends cut flat
